S.FORM: Chile Chile Chile Chile kapulungan a kanatal "Spain a kamu u República de Chile" ngangan tu Chile , u nutimulan a Amilikan a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Chile智利共和國(西班牙語:República de Chile), .) u siwkay nu kanatal u Chile sa i labu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 30 00 S, 71 00 W u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 756,102 km2 u ahebal nu lalaay sa izaw ku 743,812 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 12,290 km2 hamin nu tademawan sa 17,650,114. kakalukan umah sa 21.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 21.90%, zumaay henay umah sa 57%. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Santiago . sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 18 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Sebastián Piñera (Saypasetian．Piniyela 塞巴斯蒂安·皮涅拉), 12 bulad 1 demiad 1949 a mihca nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Chile ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 3 bulad 11 demiad. u hata u kulit nu hata nu Chile sa, u semilaway, u salengacay atu sumanahay. si salengacay a bunac i pabaw nu hata. Chile Chile kapulungan a kanatal "Spain a kamu u República de Chile" ngangan tu Chile , u nutimulan a Amilika a kanatal. satipan u Chile atu timulan micapi waliyu nuwamisan micapi tu Peru , nuwalian micapi tu Bolivia 及Argentina . u nian a kanatal nutimulan a Amilikan a sakaput a kanatal, i nutimulan a Amilikan atu Argentina atu Brazil palecat "ABC icelayay a kanatal", caay kunian dada' , Chile atu Ecuador caay kahiza atu Brazil madatulas tu nutimulan a Amilikan a kanatal. (u sulit nu hulam: Chile智利共和國(西班牙語:República de Chile), "ABC強國". .) Chile a kakitizaan i tini satimulan tu nu Amilikan a talu atu Nan-ciy-zuw uyza silaet dada' tu De-ley-ke a bayuan masapauwan, i kitakit u sakatimulanay a kanatal, pakay tu nu Nan-ciy-zuw a sakuwan caay ka saasip kunilalabu ,satu Chile a tademaw hinasakamu tuni uzipay a kanatal, " u sabataday nu hekal a kanatal" u tadamaw nu Chile pakala tu 1,800 mang, u nikasabinacadan u salengacay a tademaw katuud ku malamelay tu nu zumaay a binacadan, atu malecad tu zumaay Argentina a kanatal, nayay ku nu Africa a iluc a tademaw, u zuma u nianay tu yincumin atu cayay kakatuud a binacadan malecad tu kakatuud. (u sulit nu hulam: .) Chile a cacudadan talakaw macakat kunipasubana', atu pasubana' tu ni tineng atu singmung atu macakatay a kanatal, palatatenga' tuni u tineng atu mutesek tu tineng a kanatal, Chile i sakaku sanay a sinbung u ni kacakat u ni sasulitan kabuwah nu tedamaw, amin a kacakat, u ni pasilut tu ngangan, maala tu satalakaway atu nutimulan a Europe a kanatal masapaseneng tu salunganay, i tini i sakayay Chile u macakatay ku cin-ci tu nuamisan a Amilikan atu Europe a kanatal, tuynian katuud ku mabulaway a iluiluc nu Asia miawas tu waliyu mabulaw mueneng i Chile . (u sulit nu hulam: .) kamu nu cacudadan Si-ban-ya a dademaw Di-ke-de-luo-sa-lay-si a cudad izaw ku Chile a ngngan ,I tizaay a tademaw Indian a binacadan Ke-ciu-ya a kamu makay Incas a ngangan, sakamu sa kuheni "Chi-le" u kasinenawan a ngangan. u ngangan nu Chile hakay namakay i Yin-ciy-zen a tademaw, u imi sa, hadikuc nu Di-siw atu kanuma. (u sulit nu hulam: 西班牙人迭戈·德· "Chile" "或"海鷗") Chile yadah kuni u lalaculan tu Kang-can buyubuyu'an u lalaculan atu mibutingay a lalaculan, Chile i kitakitan u Tung-kang a lalaculan u sayadahay nu kanatal, i kitakitan sayadahay nu kanatal ni patahekalan tu Tung si nganagn tu u kapahay a nganagn" Tung-kang a Hung-ti a kanatal", u zumasatu i lalabuay nu kanatal A-ta-ka-ma-sa-mu u sakakeladay i kitakit, uyni satu Chile uyza aca I kitakit uyzayamin nu tahakay yamin a sanicaway a Siaw-se-cuang a kanatal. saazihan tu laylay nu Chile nu amisan nu Chile i Spain mialaay katukuh I ayaw u tungusay nu In-ciy-di-ku ,namakay kasumamadan tu 16 a mihcaan, mulakal ku Spain a tademaw malingatu miala tu Chile 1541 a mihcaan patizeng tu tuze ku Sen-ti-ya-ke , tumulay a Ma-pu-ciye a tademaw saicelang sa mipacuy tu Spain a tademaw nu micumuday i tini katukuh i kasasumamadan tu 19 a mihcaan, kya mala u tungusay tu nu Chile a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) piazihan tulala' nu hekal Chile nu timulan nuwamisan a laet pakala tu 4,300 km, i tini An-di-se a buyu'an atu waliyu a bayuan, palalecal tu nu walian satipan a salaet 200 km dada' "u saahebalay pakala tu 400 km dada'", uynian a lala' nu kanatal azihan samapepet, mala u i kitakitay yamin u masatanayaay a kanatal, satu izaw kungangan kan lamaymay sanay kunipangangan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: "絲帶國"稱號.) Chile malatulu a kenis : nuwamisan yadah ku buyu' yadah ku masaungcuyay buyu' pakala tu 6,000 a beti', i An-di-se-san-may a buyu'an tusa ku masakululay a buyu'an u tabukan nu A-ta-ka-ma a likelikenan, kuyni u masaacakay a kakitizaan nu kitakit,. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ) tepanay nu kanatal, u demiad mahiza u nu bayu'an a bali, uynian a kenis sidamek ku lala', katuud ku tademaw u kahenulan a tuse Sen-di-ya-ke "pakala tu 650 a mang ku nuenengay a tademaw i tini satusa izaw henay Wa-le-pa-lay-suo "i minatu nuenengay a tademaw pakala tu 280,000 ztu Kang-say-pa-si-weng " u tapang nu saupu nu kusi atu malukay akawaw i tiza nuengenay a tatemaw 50,000 u kahenulan a tusz. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) nutimulan satu caay kakatuud ku tademaw nikahina udad tabaki ku bali hina sawsawni makeleng, ayaw nu dadipasan yadah ku subal tu manganiway adihep. (u kamu nuHulam sa: .) makay satipan pasayza i sawalian saayaway u ma likecu a dadipasan, satu u buyu'an, satusa usaahebalay a buyu', I tepanay uyni u talakaway a buyu', sidabek kapah apalumaan atu pahutinan Chile atu Bolivia atu Argentina tu lilies nu kanatal u An-di-se-san-may a buyu'an u nuwali kulul a buyu'. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) kanahatu i Tay-ping-yanh I tepan izaw ku Hu-an-biy-bil-nan-an-sung-daw atu bu-huo-cun-daw u nu Chile a subal. cacay a bihcaan a cudad I Chile a nu amisan a An-tuo-pa-ciy-se-ta u 12.7 a haw-mi, i Sen-di-ya-ke 375 haw-mi, iI nutimulan Hu-di-daw 5,800 haw-mi. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 5800毫米. makaysatipan pasayza katukuh i walian saayaway u tanaya'ay u likecuay a dadipasan, satu u buyubuyu'ay, satu u ahebalay a buyubuyu'an. i tepan u talakaway u sakapahay a lala',taneng maluk atu u pahutinan. Chile atu Bu-li-wey-ya atu Argentina i lilies nu A-ti-se-san-may nu walian a buyu'. kanahatu i Tay-ping-yanh I tepan izaw ku Hu-an-biy-bil-nan-an-sung-daw atu bu-huo-cun-daw u nu Chile a subal. cacay a bihcaan a cudad I Chile a nu amisan a An-tuo-pa-ciy-se-ta u 12.7 a haw-mi, i Sen-di-ya-ke 375 haw-mi, iI nutimulan Hu-di-daw 5,800 haw-mi. pisupet tu lalangawan Chile pisupet tu lalangawan mala nu Europe mabulaway nu a tademaw nu babalaki pulung tu lisin nu Ing-ti-an a tademaw, misulup tu nuwamisan a Amilikan a liain, satu Chile alalangawan caay kalecat nu tu kasakitakit a lalangawan nikamisengisengi aca. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) demiad maawas ku 38 wiy-du ku lala', icay icuwacuwaay a kakitizaan a caay kalecad kudemiad uyni a kanatal mibalat maawas tu 38 wiy-du, satu ku icuwacuwaay a kakitizaan caay kalecad ku lala', Chile pasuyadah masazumaay a wayway nu bali, cay ku sasakamuan mahiniay a demiad nu Chile a kanadal. 2012 a mihcaan Chile a tademaw izaw ku 16,341,929 a tademaw, uyzasa 1990 a mihcaan a zitayan a nilecuhan caay tu kakatuud, Chile a tademaw u nikacunus mahizatu caay kakatuud ku tademaw, paliayaw tu 2050 a mihcaanay a tademaw a tangasa tu 2,020 a bang,satusa a tahekal a tademaw caay tu kacunus ku tademaw. Chile u katuuday a binacadan a siykay, patinaku tu mahiniay a kitakit kuuday a kitakitay a tademaw yadahay a kitakitay a micumutay a tademaw izaw ku印第安人 atu nu canacananan a malamelay a izang a nisakaputan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: 智利 u sulit nu Lipun: チリ共和国 u sulit nu Amilika: Chile

Chile Chile Chile Chile kapolongan a kanatal "Spain a kamo o República de Chile" ngangan to Chile , o notimolan a Amilikan a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam sa: Chile智利共和國(西班牙語:República de Chile), .) o siwkay no kanatal o Chile sa i labo no Congnanmeico, itiza i 30 00 S, 71 00 W o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 756,102 km2 o ahebal no lalaay sa izaw ko 743,812 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 12,290 km2 hamin no tademawan sa 17,650,114. kakalokan omah sa 21.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 21.90%, zomaay henay omah sa 57%. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Santiago . sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 18 bolad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Sebastián Piñera (Saypasetian．Piniyela 塞巴斯蒂安·皮涅拉), 12 bolad 1 demiad 1949 a mihca nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Chile ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 3 bolad 11 demiad. o hata o kolit no hata no Chile sa, o semilaway, o salengacay ato somanahay. si salengacay a bonac i pabaw no hata. Chile Chile kapolongan a kanatal "Spain a kamo o República de Chile" ngangan to Chile , o notimolan a Amilika a kanatal. satipan o Chile ato timolan micapi waliyo nowamisan micapi to Pero , nowalian micapi to Bolivia 及Argentina . o nian a kanatal notimolan a Amilikan a sakapot a kanatal, i notimolan a Amilikan ato Argentina ato Brazil palecat "ABC icelayay a kanatal", caay konian dada' , Chile ato Ecoador caay kahiza ato Brazil madatolas to notimolan a Amilikan a kanatal. (o solit no holam: Chile智利共和國(西班牙語:República de Chile), "ABC強國". .) Chile a kakitizaan i tini satimolan to no Amilikan a talo ato Nan-ciy-zow oyza silaet dada' to De-ley-ke a bayoan masapaowan, i kitakit o sakatimolanay a kanatal, pakay to no Nan-ciy-zow a sakowan caay ka saasip konilalabo ,sato Chile a tademaw hinasakamo toni ozipay a kanatal, " o sabataday no hekal a kanatal" o tadamaw no Chile pakala to 1,800 mang, o nikasabinacadan o salengacay a tademaw katood ko malamelay to no zomaay a binacadan, ato malecad to zomaay Argentina a kanatal, nayay ko no Africa a iloc a tademaw, o zoma o nianay to yincomin ato cayay kakatood a binacadan malecad to kakatood. (o solit no holam: .) Chile a cacodadan talakaw macakat konipasobana', ato pasobana' to ni tineng ato singmong ato macakatay a kanatal, palatatenga' toni o tineng ato motesek to tineng a kanatal, Chile i sakako sanay a sinbong o ni kacakat o ni sasolitan kabowah no tedamaw, amin a kacakat, o ni pasilot to ngangan, maala to satalakaway ato notimolan a Eorope a kanatal masapaseneng to salonganay, i tini i sakayay Chile o macakatay ko cin-ci to noamisan a Amilikan ato Eorope a kanatal, toynian katood ko mabolaway a iloiloc no Asia miawas to waliyo mabolaw moeneng i Chile . (o solit no holam: .) kamo no cacodadan Si-ban-ya a dademaw Di-ke-de-loo-sa-lay-si a codad izaw ko Chile a ngngan ,I tizaay a tademaw Indian a binacadan Ke-cio-ya a kamo makay Incas a ngangan, sakamo sa koheni "Chi-le" o kasinenawan a ngangan. o ngangan no Chile hakay namakay i Yin-ciy-zen a tademaw, o imi sa, hadikoc no Di-siw ato kanoma. (o solit no holam: 西班牙人迭戈·德· "Chile" "或"海鷗") Chile yadah koni o lalacolan to Kang-can boyoboyo'an o lalacolan ato mibotingay a lalacolan, Chile i kitakitan o Tong-kang a lalacolan o sayadahay no kanatal, i kitakitan sayadahay no kanatal ni patahekalan to Tong si nganagn to o kapahay a nganagn" Tong-kang a Hong-ti a kanatal", o zomasato i lalaboay no kanatal A-ta-ka-ma-sa-mo o sakakeladay i kitakit, oyni sato Chile oyza aca I kitakit oyzayamin no tahakay yamin a sanicaway a Siaw-se-coang a kanatal. saazihan to laylay no Chile no amisan no Chile i Spain mialaay katokoh I ayaw o tongosay no In-ciy-di-ko ,namakay kasomamadan to 16 a mihcaan, molakal ko Spain a tademaw malingato miala to Chile 1541 a mihcaan patizeng to toze ko Sen-ti-ya-ke , tomolay a Ma-po-ciye a tademaw saicelang sa mipacoy to Spain a tademaw no micomoday i tini katokoh i kasasomamadan to 19 a mihcaan, kya mala o tongosay to no Chile a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) piazihan tolala' no hekal Chile no timolan nowamisan a laet pakala to 4,300 km, i tini An-di-se a boyo'an ato waliyo a bayoan, palalecal to no walian satipan a salaet 200 km dada' "o saahebalay pakala to 400 km dada'", oynian a lala' no kanatal azihan samapepet, mala o i kitakitay yamin o masatanayaay a kanatal, sato izaw kongangan kan lamaymay sanay konipangangan. (o kamo no Holam sa: "絲帶國"稱號.) Chile malatolo a kenis : nowamisan yadah ko boyo' yadah ko masaongcoyay boyo' pakala to 6,000 a beti', i An-di-se-san-may a boyo'an tosa ko masakololay a boyo'an o tabokan no A-ta-ka-ma a likelikenan, koyni o masaacakay a kakitizaan no kitakit,. (o kamo no Holam sa: ) tepanay no kanatal, o demiad mahiza o no bayo'an a bali, oynian a kenis sidamek ko lala', katood ko tademaw o kahenolan a tose Sen-di-ya-ke "pakala to 650 a mang ko noenengay a tademaw i tini satosa izaw henay Wa-le-pa-lay-soo "i minato noenengay a tademaw pakala to 280,000 zto Kang-say-pa-si-weng " o tapang no saopo no kosi ato malokay akawaw i tiza noengenay a tatemaw 50,000 o kahenolan a tosz. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) notimolan sato caay kakatood ko tademaw nikahina odad tabaki ko bali hina sawsawni makeleng, ayaw no dadipasan yadah ko sobal to manganiway adihep. (o kamo noHolam sa: .) makay satipan pasayza i sawalian saayaway o ma likeco a dadipasan, sato o boyo'an, satosa osaahebalay a boyo', I tepanay oyni o talakaway a boyo', sidabek kapah apalomaan ato pahotinan Chile ato Bolivia ato Argentina to lilies no kanatal o An-di-se-san-may a boyo'an o nowali kolol a boyo'. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) kanahato i Tay-ping-yanh I tepan izaw ko Ho-an-biy-bil-nan-an-song-daw ato bo-hoo-con-daw o no Chile a sobal. cacay a bihcaan a codad I Chile a no amisan a An-too-pa-ciy-se-ta o 12.7 a haw-mi, i Sen-di-ya-ke 375 haw-mi, iI notimolan Ho-di-daw 5,800 haw-mi. (o kamo no Holam sa: 5800毫米. makaysatipan pasayza katokoh i walian saayaway o tanaya'ay o likecoay a dadipasan, sato o boyoboyo'ay, sato o ahebalay a boyoboyo'an. i tepan o talakaway o sakapahay a lala',taneng malok ato o pahotinan. Chile ato Bo-li-wey-ya ato Argentina i lilies no A-ti-se-san-may no walian a boyo'. kanahato i Tay-ping-yanh I tepan izaw ko Ho-an-biy-bil-nan-an-song-daw ato bo-hoo-con-daw o no Chile a sobal. cacay a bihcaan a codad I Chile a no amisan a An-too-pa-ciy-se-ta o 12.7 a haw-mi, i Sen-di-ya-ke 375 haw-mi, iI notimolan Ho-di-daw 5,800 haw-mi. pisopet to lalangawan Chile pisopet to lalangawan mala no Eorope mabolaway no a tademaw no babalaki polong to lisin no Ing-ti-an a tademaw, misolop to nowamisan a Amilikan a liain, sato Chile alalangawan caay kalecat no to kasakitakit a lalangawan nikamisengisengi aca. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) demiad maawas ko 38 wiy-do ko lala', icay icowacowaay a kakitizaan a caay kalecad kodemiad oyni a kanatal mibalat maawas to 38 wiy-do, sato ko icowacowaay a kakitizaan caay kalecad ko lala', Chile pasoyadah masazomaay a wayway no bali, cay ko sasakamoan mahiniay a demiad no Chile a kanadal. 2012 a mihcaan Chile a tademaw izaw ko 16,341,929 a tademaw, oyzasa 1990 a mihcaan a zitayan a nilecohan caay to kakatood, Chile a tademaw o nikaconos mahizato caay kakatood ko tademaw, paliayaw to 2050 a mihcaanay a tademaw a tangasa to 2,020 a bang,satosa a tahekal a tademaw caay to kaconos ko tademaw. Chile o katooday a binacadan a siykay, patinako to mahiniay a kitakit kooday a kitakitay a tademaw yadahay a kitakitay a micomotay a tademaw izaw ko印第安人 ato no canacananan a malamelay a izang a nisakapotan. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam: 智利 o solit no Lipon: チリ共和国 o solit no Amilika: Chile
